positions.title: Senior Member of Technical Staff
positions.description:
Delivered complex bug fixes and support release features for VMware Site Recovery Manager (SRM), versions 4.1.1, 4.1.2, 4.1.3, 5.0.1, 5.0.2, 5.0.3, and 5.1.1.

VMware SRM is a disaster management application for data centers, which host a large quantity of virtual machines and virtual machine hosts. Data replication is performed via SAN or ESX hosts at scheduled intervals, between a primary site and a secondary site. When recovery is triggered, SRM turns off the disaster-struck primary site, and activates the secondary site. The data center is up and running again -- its losses of data and configurations are mitigated.

Technologies: C++, STL, boost, Java (Spring Framework), Multithreading, Scripting, Storage Management, Digital Security (X.509, SSL/TLS, RSA, SHA), Virtualization, vCenter, ESX.

Platforms: Windows, Linux.

received.text: Marco and I worked together on an innovative system composed of Docker, Kafka, Zookeeper, NoSQL, EC2, S3, and custom Python/shell scripting Linux services, among other advanced technologies. I was very impressed that Marco was always on top of his job, knowing the entire technology stack very well. He is definitely detail-oriented, works hard, and is a natural at systems engineering. I am confident that Marco will continue being a strong player in any engineering team, and would work with him again.

Frank worked tirelessly and relentlessly with my development team toward the common goal, that was to ensure the software product enterprise-class, i.e. it must have the highest quality, reliability, and usability possible. Nothing could stop him from initiating, and successfully executing, extensive plans and strategies to thoroughly test the product. His communication to developers was clear, comprehensive, and fast, almost always around the clock. Many successful test plans and automation tests were created and executed successfully from Frank's vision. Overall, Frank led an excellent QE team that did a great job ensuring the quality of the product, and his leadership made the team execute even better. He's an excellent QE manager.
